page.title: 17Home Life in Llandovery
page.content: All the ten year old children in our class in school have{colour {televisions.}Half have two televisions and some even three.Two thirds have {videos.}All have some form of{tape {recorder or record player.}All have {washing machines,}two thirds being automatic where you just load the wash and take it out after it's spun.A third have a{tumble dryer}which dries clothes by electricity.Most homes have the following{electrical appliances cooker,food freezer,toaster,radio alarm,sandwich toaster,suction cleaner and refrigerator.Less than half have a dishwasher,microwave oven, shaver point,knife,hair styling brush.
